elevatedvision.name: Elevation
elevatedvision.settings.shading-algorith: Polygons: Represent shadows caused by limited-height walls using polygons for token vision. WebGL: Use WebGL for light shadows and token vision caused by limited height walls. In addition, use WebGL to shade canvas areas for lights and token vision where terrain is higher than the light or token vision respectively.
elevatedvision.settings.auto-change-elev: If selected, will automatically adjust token elevation based on elevation layer data. Token elevation is only adjusted if the token is currently 'on the ground.'
When auto-adjusting, use the average elevation under the token shape. If false, use the token center-point to determine elevation.

elevatedvision.controls.clear.name: Clear all

elevatedvision.sceneconfig.elevationstep: Elevation steps (increments) permitted in this scene. Maximum elevation for a scene equals minimum + 255 * increment.
